languages.text: {n}Он, как и десятки других изловленных мутантов, были подвергнуты строгому дознанию. Информация, поведанная ими, не имела особой ценности и состояла из глупых крестьянских суеверий, но все немочи утверждали, что, если не атаковать пораженный регион, он не будет расширяться. Гипотеза эта подтвердилась, и агрокомплексы, прилегающие к оскверненному сектору, возобновили нормальную работу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Он, как и десятки других изловленных мутантов, были подвергнуты строгому дознанию. Информация, поведанная ими, не имела особой ценности и состояла из глупых крестьянских суеверий, но все немочи утверждали, что, если не атаковать пораженный регион, он не будет расширяться. Гипотеза эта подтвердилась, и агрокомплексы, прилегающие к оскверненному сектору, возобновили нормальную работу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes soon resumed normal operation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Он, как и десятки других изловленных мутантов, были подвергнуты строгому дознанию. Информация, поведанная ими, не имела особой ценности и состояла из глупых крестьянских суеверий, но все немочи утверждали, что, если не атаковать пораженный регион, он не будет расширяться. Гипотеза эта подтвердилась, и агрокомплексы, прилегающие к оскверненному сектору, возобновили нормальную работу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes resumed normal operation.{/n}

{n}Observing the afflicted region allowed the Rogue Trader's servants to spot certain patterns in its vital activity. They used this knowledge to protect the surrounding agri-complexes from its influence.{/n}

{n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes resumed normal operation.{/n}

This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes soon resumed normal operation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}丑恶种与其他数十个被俘的变种人被彻底审问。他们对加努斯的情况知之甚少，而且几乎没什么重要价值，绝大部分都仅仅是荒谬的迷信。然而，所有丑恶种都一致声称，只要不去干扰受灾地区，它就不会进一步扩大。这个说法很快得到证实，邻近的综合农业中心很快恢复了正常运作。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes soon resumed normal operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}丑恶种与其他数十个被俘的变种人被彻底审问。他们对加努斯的情况知之甚少，而且几乎没什么重要价值，绝大部分都仅仅是荒谬的迷信。然而，所有丑恶种都一致声称，只要不去干扰受灾地区，它就不会进一步扩大。这个说法很快得到证实，邻近的综合农业中心很快恢复了正常运作。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La nauseabunda fue interrogada a fondo, al igual que otras docenas de mutantes cautivos. Lo poco que fueron capaces de contar no tenía ningún valor significativo: la mayor parte eran supersticiones campesinas sin sentido, aunque todas las nauseabundas juntas afirmaron que, si se dejaba en paz la región afectada, no se expandiría. Esta afirmación no tardó en confirmarse, y los agrocomplejos adyacentes no tardaron en reanudar su funcionamiento normal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes soon resumed normal operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La nauseabunda fue interrogada a fondo, al igual que otras docenas de mutantes cautivos. Lo poco que fueron capaces de contar no tenía ningún valor significativo: la mayor parte eran supersticiones campesinas sin sentido, aunque todas las nauseabundas juntas afirmaron que, si se dejaba en paz la región afectada, no se expandiría. Esta afirmación no tardó en confirmarse, y los agrocomplejos adyacentes no tardaron en reanudar su funcionamiento normal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異民は徹底的に尋問され、他の数十体の変異体捕虜も同様に尋問が行われた。奴らが語ることができたのは大したことのない話で...ほとんどが無意味な農民の迷信だった。とはいえ、異民が一体となって被害を受けた地域を放っておいても拡大することはないと主張した。この主張に基づいて確認が行われ、近隣の農業施設は間もなく通常の運営を再開した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes soon resumed normal operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異民は徹底的に尋問され、他の数十体の変異体捕虜も同様に尋問が行われた。奴らが語ることができたのは大したことのない話で...ほとんどが無意味な農民の迷信だった。とはいえ、異民が一体となって被害を受けた地域を放っておいても拡大することはないと主張した。この主張に基づいて確認が行われ、近隣の農業施設は間もなく通常の運営を再開した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'infâme est interrogé avec zèle, tout comme des dizaines d'autres mutants captifs. Les rares informations qu'on parvint à leur soutirer ne sont qu'un ramassis de superstitions ridicules et de croyances paysannes, mais ils se rejoignent tous sur un point : si on laisse la région en paix, ils assurent que le problème y restera cantonné Cette affirmation est rapidement confirmée, et les agri-complexes voisins peuvent reprendre à plein régime.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes soon resumed normal operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'infâme est interrogé avec zèle, tout comme des dizaines d'autres mutants captifs. Les rares informations qu'on parvint à leur soutirer ne sont qu'un ramassis de superstitions ridicules et de croyances paysannes, mais ils se rejoignent tous sur un point : si on laisse la région en paix, ils assurent que le problème y restera cantonné Cette affirmation est rapidement confirmée, et les agri-complexes voisins peuvent reprendre à plein régime.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Speier wurde gründlichst verhört, genau wie Dutzende anderer gefangen genommener Mutanten. Das bisschen, was sie zu sagen hatten, war nicht von großem Wert. Das meiste war unsinniger Aberglaube, wie er im Pöbel üblich ist. Alle Speier sagten aber, dass sich die betroffene Region nicht vergrößern würde, wenn man sie nur in Ruhe lässt. Diese Behauptung bestätigte sich, und die benachbarten Agri-Komplex konnten schon bald ihren normalen Betrieb wieder aufnehmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes soon resumed normal operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Speier wurde gründlichst verhört, genau wie Dutzende anderer gefangen genommener Mutanten. Das bisschen, was sie zu sagen hatten, war nicht von großem Wert. Das meiste war unsinniger Aberglaube, wie er im Pöbel üblich ist. Alle Speier sagten aber, dass sich die betroffene Region nicht vergrößern würde, wenn man sie nur in Ruhe lässt. Diese Behauptung bestätigte sich, und die benachbarten Agri-Komplex konnten schon bald ihren normalen Betrieb wieder aufnehmen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leşin yanı sıra düzinelerce tutsak mutant, etraflıca sorgulandı. Ağızlarından çıkan üç beş kelime arasında kayda değer bir kıymeti olan yoktu. Söylediklerinin çoğu, köylülerin anlamsız batıl inançlarından ibaretti. Ancak tüm leşler, sanki birlik olmuşçasına müteessir bölgenin rahat bırakılırsa genişlemeyeceğini iddia ettiler. Bu iddia kısa süre içinde onaylandı ve komşu tarım kompleksleri, çok geçmeden normal faaliyetlerini sürdürmeye başladılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The retch was thoroughly interrogated, and so were dozens of other captive mutants. What little they were able to tell was of no significant value — most of it was nonsensical peasant superstition, although all the retches as one claimed that if the afflicted region was left alone, it would not expand. This assertion was soon confirmed, and the neighbouring agri-complexes soon resumed normal operation.{/n}
